page.title: 08CANOEING AND SAILING.
page.content: At Beecraigs Country Park there are good facilities for canoeing and sailing. It is possible to have a single try_out, or to book a course of lessons. Courses start at nine a.m. and finish at three p.m. Instructors take people in groups of six.They teach them how to handle the canoe properly. When you are experienced enough you can paddle round the island in the middle of the loch.The island is a bird sanctuary. To learn to sail, two-man dinghies are used. First of all you are taught to assemble the mast and rudder.Then the instructors show you how to handle the boat. At the end of the course a race is organised. It is a very enjoyable kind of lesson.
